CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper February 15, 1947, pg. 23, reads: "Sweetheart Valentine - In preparation for a Sweetheart Valentine dance to be given at the YMCA on Friday, Feb. 14, these misses met at the YMCA Tuesday to map plans. Left to right: [cut off] Norvell, Barbara Baxter, Delores Bruce, Sa... [cut off] and Sylvia Green. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Ms Norvell, Barbara Baxter, Delores Bruce holding heart shaped sign inscribed "Who will be Miss Sweetheart, Fri. Feb. 14th?," unknown young woman, and Sylvia Green
CatSubject_tab: Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Young Men's Christian Association (Pittsburgh, Pa.)
